attributes.action: support the proposal to allow Disabled War veterans with specific needs i.e multi amputees, blind etc to be allowed to reside wherever they wish
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mr Tony Blair as prime minister said that he would like to make britain a place for hereos.
I therefore ask the British Government to allow Disabled service personel to be able to choose their prefered place of residence within the general community. And that all possible assistance be given to enable this, including the right to build a dwelling on their own property specific to their needs.
